Binary: ibus, ibus-data, ibus-tests, libibus-1.0-5, libibus-1.0-dev, ibus-gtk, ibus-gtk3, ibus-gtk4, ibus-wayland, ibus-doc, gir1.2-ibus-1.0, python3-ibus-1.0
Build-Depends: dbus-x11 <!nocheck>, debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-exec, desktop-file-utils, dh-python, gettext, gnome-pkg-tools, gobject-introspection, gtk-doc-tools <!nodoc>, iso-codes, libdbusmenu-glib-dev, libdbusmenu-gtk3-dev, libdconf-dev, libgirepository1.0-dev, libglib2.0-dev (>= 2.62.2-2), libgtk-3-bin, libgtk-3-dev, libgtk-4-bin, libgtk-4-dev, libgtk2.0-dev, libnotify-dev, libtool, libwayland-dev [linux-any], pkgconf, python-gi-dev, python3-all, systemd-dev [linux-any], unicode-cldr-core (>= 44), unicode-data (>= 15.1), valac, xauth <!nocheck>, xkb-data (>= 2.38), xvfb <!nocheck>
Description: Intelligent Input Bus IBus is an Intelligent Input Bus. It is a new input framework for the Linux OS. It provides full featured and user friendly input method user interface. It also may help developers to develop input method easily.
